title: Grimdark Survivors
description: Grimdark Survivors is an adrenaline-pumping roguelite game where you have to survive an alien attack. Choose your hero, arm yourself, and prepare to face the relentless darkness. Each hero offers a unique playing style so that each game will feel fresh and exciting. There are many choices of weapons to choose such as precision assault rifles to flamethrowers! Experiment, strategize, and find the perfect weapon that suits your style to conquer the darkness. You will not only face waves of enemies but also tough bosses that will test your braveness. Use the skills and equipment you acquire to achieve victory.
